reviewText:
Found the Dvd while surfing the net and decided to risk the purchase without knowing Regional coding (Turns out to be region 3, which is playing on my region 2 player)

About the show - its awesome - the band absolutely rocks - I do not speak the language, but the music is easily understood.

GREAT SOLOS AND GUEST PERFORMANCES!!

It's scandalous that Sony/BGM does not release this stuff worldwide!!!!!

Ant Toohey - Pmb, South Africa
